vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
φωστήρ, ῆρος, ὁ,
that which gives light, οἱ φ. the lights of heaven, stars, [LXX+4th c.BC+]; οἱ δύο φ., i.e. sun and moon, [NT+5th c.AD+]
__2 splendour, radiance, ὁ φ. αὐτῆς ὅμοιος λίθῳ τιμιωτάτῳ [NT]
__3 metaphorically, of a king, τῷ φ. τῷ ἡμετέρῳ [Refs 4th c.AD+]
__4 of the eyes, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II opening for light, door or window, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
star; brilliance, splendor light
a cause of light, illuminator; a light, luminary, star, Phil. 2:15; radiance, brilliance, splendor or, luminary, Rev. 21:11*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: luz, estrella ; resplandor, brillo (de piedras preciosas)
